lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Ronald Tappmeyer, president of the International Association of Drilling Contractors, said, "The members of our trade asssociation are convinced that only a variable oil import fee that sets a minimum price trigger can protect our nation."

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: "The industry is deeply divided between those who support an oil tariff and those who believe tax incentives are better," said Daniel Yergin, director of Cambridge Energy Research Associates, which recently completed a survey of the U.

lst.name: sentence
lst.str: Yergin said that the poll which was conducted in January by a former Congressman, Orval Hansen, showed support for the oil import fee from 22 pct of the Congressmen surveyed largely as a means of protecting the domestic petroleum industry.
